Description: Rectangular wooden inner-coffin of Sobekhotep; recessed Hieroglyphic characters coloured blue.
Curator's comments: References: PM IV: p. 187 See Davies in Davies and Scholfield (eds.) Egypt, the Aegean and the Levant, 1995, p.148 [pl.10.1]. Harco Willems Chests of Life, 1988, [cat no. BH1L]. Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 350 To be published by Burkhard Backes
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Frederick George Hilton Price
